participant_1.background:
I love dressing up in hunter green, even if it makes my family laugh.
we have two sons.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
i am a full time mom.
i have a poodle named nanette.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.
i have a severe phobia of wide open spaces.
i hate that my mom made me get braces.
I love growing plants in my greenhouse, but I have to be careful about what I grow because of my asthma.
I now have a new most valuable possession - my library card.

content.text: I'm doing okay! How about you?
I'm doing pretty well! I just got back from a trip to the library.
Oh, that sounds fun! Did you check out any good books?
I did! I checked out a book about gardening. I'm hoping to start a garden in my backyard this year.
That's awesome! I love gardening. I have a small greenhouse in my backyard where I grow plants.
That's so cool! I've always wanted a greenhouse.
It's really great! I love being able to grow my own plants.
What kind of plants do you grow?
I grow a variety of plants, including tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, and herbs.
Wow! That's a lot of plants.
Yeah, it is! But it's so much fun.
I'm sure it is! I'm excited to start my own garden this year.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
